message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll love it!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay $140 for the product.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I still need to make a profit. How about $160?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a price of $150 for the product.
I'm glad we're close, Bob. However, I've invested a lot in this product, so I need to make a bit more than $150. How about we meet at $165?
I understand your position, Alice. Given my budget constraints, I would like to propose a final price of $155 for the product.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go below $170. This is my final offer. If you're interested, let me know, otherwise, I'll explore other options.
